docs.title: Welcome to DMP-documents
docs.text: This is the online operation manual for the DMP project.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    operation manual.md       # An operation manual

Target

{"accessMode":1,"typeSpec":{"type":2,"range":["2304x1296","1920x1080","1280x720"]},"defaultValue":"1280x720"} 20233 Video.Input[0].Venc[1].Resolution High_sub_stream_resolution Property Can be sent and reported(rw) Enum Enumeration values: 800x448, 640x360 ["800x448", "640x360"] {"accessMode":1,"typeSpec":{"type":2,"range":["800x448","640x360"]},"defaultValue":"640x360"} [1] The full name is Data Point ID, abbreviated as DPID. DP is the abbreviation for product functionality in device applications, and DP ID is a simple encoding of product functionality, usually in integer form, such as 1, 2, 101. The functional data between the device and the cloud is transmitted through DP ID. [2] The string representation of functionality, also known as product dpcode, is used in applications with multilingual capabilities, such as mobile applications. Supports letters, numbers, and underscores, starting with a letter. [3] The English name of the product function is only used for platform display. [4] Property: Used to describe the dynamic characteristics of a device, including its runtime state. Applications can initiate requests to read and set attributes.Event: Upward messages that can be triggered during device operation, such as record information of device operation, alarms and fault information issued when the device is abnormal; Can contain multiple output parameters.Movement: Used to describe the ability of terminal devices to be called externally, and can set input and output parameters. Movement can implement complex business logic, such as executing a specific task; Support synchronous or asynchronous return of results. [5] The type of data transmission refers to the direction and capability of data flow between the device and the server.Reported Only(wr):This attribute can only be reported to the server by the device (or terminal). In other words, this attribute is write only, and the server cannot set or change its value. It can only receive its status or data from the device.Send Only(ro):This attribute can only be issued by the server to the device. This attribute is read-only, and the device can read the value of this attribute, but cannot change it. This is usually used by the server to send configuration or instructions to the device.Can be sent and reported(rw):This attribute can be reported by the device to the server or issued by the server to the device. This attribute is read write and can be modified by both the server and the device. [6] The data type that defines the values of product functions. Divided into the following types:Boolean: A binary variable that is either true or false. For example, the on or off function of a switch.Value: A linearly adjustable type of data. For example, temperature regulation, with a temperature range of 20-40 ℃.Enum: a custom finite set value. For example, low-end, mid-range, and high-end heaters.Fault: a functional point used for reporting and statistics of faults, supporting multiple faults and only reporting data. For example, temperature sensor failure, motor failure, and high temperature failure.String: A product feature transmitted in the form of a string.Raw: A product feature that is transmitted in binary form. [7] Further clarify the numerical range, spacing, and units of numerical product functions. [8] For some complex or collaborative product features, you can indicate relevant precautions in the notes and remind other team members. [9] Briefly describe the purpose of the function [10] The functional code ultimately stored on the server.  ​        ​        ​       ​      ​      ​      ​

docs.title: The process of generating an authorization code for the product
Create a product
docs.text:
Login to the DMP Management backend (CPPLUS DMP).

Click Product Development and select Create Product.

Enter the information about the product, (Examples: Product Name: Testcamera, Product Model: C2-A-DP, Product Type:dome camera, Communication Protocols:WiFi), click Confirm to complete the creation, as shown in the figure.

docs.title: Set up the functional configuration of the product
docs.text:
After the creation is successful, click the Continue Development button to continue configuring the information of the product.

Configure the standard functions and firmware required for the product.

Example: Add existing standard features to the product.

Select the firmware for association.

docs.title: Configure device interaction information
docs.text:
• Functional grouping module
Note: If the configuration of grouping and standard functions has been added to the standard function grouping module (as shown in the figure below), 
when the product is added to the corresponding standard function, the grouping and standard function configuration will be automatically brought into the module of the product for easy configuration; 
Of course, the product can also customize the grouping and standard function configuration of the module.
  • Function Settings module

This module displays the standard functions configured in the previous section and can be controlled whether or not to display.

Product Display module, you can upload the display picture, product name and model name of the configured product, and click Save.

The Configuration Instruction module is used to configure the configuration wizard content for different addition methods.

Example: Configure the network configuration wizard added by WIFI, there is a preview effect on the right, click Save after filling in.

Voice Control module, which can control whether the product has voice control enabled (control all devices under the product).

docs.title: Publish the product and generate an authorization code
docs.text:
After the product-related content is configured, the product is in the development state and the authorization code cannot be generated.

Click the pre-release button, select the data center, enter the quantity and remarks to generate the authorization code.

Example: Generate 100 authorization codes

After the system processing is complete, you can export the corresponding authorization code file.

docs.title: The process of generating an authorization code for the product
Login to the DMP Management backend (CPPLUS DMP).
docs.text:
Click Product Development and select Create Product.

Enter the information about the product (Examples: Product Name: Testcamera, Product Model: C2-A-DP, Product Type:dome camera, Communication Protocols:WiFi), click Confirm to complete the creation, as shown in the figure.

docs.title: Set up the functional configuration of the product
docs.text:
• After the creation is successful, click the Continue Development button to continue configuring the information of the product.

  • Configure the standard functions and firmware required for the product.

  • Configure device interaction information

i. Functional grouping module

Note: If the configuration of grouping and standard functions has been added to the standard function grouping module (as shown in the figure below), when the product is added to the corresponding standard function, the grouping and standard function configuration will be automatically brought into the module of the product for easy configuration; Of course, the product can also customize the grouping and standard function configuration of the module.

​ ii. Function Settings module

​ This module displays the standard functions configured in the previous section and can be controlled whether or not to display.

​ iii. Product Display module, you can upload the display picture, product name and model name of the configured product, and click Save.

​ iv. The Configuration Instruction module is used to configure the configuration wizard content for different addition methods.

​ Example: Configure the network configuration wizard added by WIFI, there is a preview effect on the right, click Save after filling in.

​ v. Voice Control module, which can control whether the product has voice control enabled (control all devices under the product).

docs.title: Publish the product and generate an authorization code
docs.text:
After the product-related content is configured, the product is in the development state and the authorization code cannot be generated.

Click the pre-release button, select the data center, enter the quantity and remarks to generate the authorization code.

Example: Generate 100 authorization codes

After the system processing is complete, you can export the corresponding authorization code file.

docs.title: 在线文档部署使用指南
docs.text:
所选工具：Mkdocs

Mkdocs是一款基于Python的静态网站生成器，可以构建项目文档。文档源文件在 Markdown 编写，使用单个 YAML 配置文件配置。

Mkdocs官方文档：Mkdocs

非官方中文文档：Mkdocs中文（很久未更新）

使用教程：Mkdocs教程

使用主题：gitbook（很久未更新）

docs.title: 产品开发
docs.text: 本文介绍如何在DMP管理后台上创建一组具有相同功能定义的设备集合（后称产品）。创建产品后通过功能定义——设备交互——批量投产，简单三步即可完成产品智能化。

docs.title: 第一步：创建产品
docs.text:
• 通过账号密码登录DMP管理后台。
  • 在左侧导航栏中单击 产品 > 产品开发 。
  • 在右侧页面中单击 创建产品 。
  • 在弹出的信息栏中填写产品信息，填写完毕后单击 确认 。
填写示例：
    产品名称：测试相机
    产品型号：C2-A-DP
    产品类型：球机
    通讯协议：WiFi
  • 新创建的产品状态为 开发中 ，会显示在下方的产品列表中。

docs.title: 第二步：配置产品功能
docs.text:
• 创建产品成功后，单击 继续开发 按钮继续配置产品功能。
  • 在 设备开发 选项卡中单击 添加功能 ，进入添加标准功能页面。
  • 在添加标准功能页面中添加您想要的功能，单击功能旁的将所需功能添加到右侧列表中。
  • 上方搜索栏可以搜索您想要的功能名，以及选择功能类型（属性/事件/动作）。
  • 在右侧列表中可以单击去除不想要的功能。
  • 选择完毕后单击 提交 按钮将右侧所选功能加入到产品里。
这里选择所有功能

docs.title: 第三步：关联固件
docs.text:
• 在 设备开发 选项卡下方单击 关联固件 ，进入关联固件页面。
  • 在关联固件页面中选择您想要关联的固件，选择完成后单击 确定 按钮。
注意：一个产品只能被一种固件所绑定。

docs.title: 第四步：配置设备交互信息
功能分组模块
docs.text: 注意：如果在标准功能分组模块中添加了分组和标准功能的配置，当产品添加相应的标准功能时，将自动将分组和标准功能配置带入产品的模块中，方便配置。

docs.title: 功能设置模块
docs.text: • 该模块显示前一节配置的标准功能，并可以控制功能是否显示。

docs.title: 产品展示模块
docs.text:
• 您可以在此模块中上传产品正面图标和45°角图标，也可以在此处修改产品名称和产品型号。
  • 修改完成后单击 保存 按钮进行保存。

docs.title: 向导配置模块
docs.text:
• 向导配置模块用于配置不同设备添加方式的向导内容。
  • 您可以编辑向导提示文本，添加提示图标，添加更多步骤以实现向导功能。
  • 编辑完成后单击 保存 按钮进行保存。
例如：配置WIFI添加的设备的配网向导。

docs.title: 语音控制模块
docs.text:
• 您可以在此模块处控制产品是否开启语音控制
注意：修改此处设置会修改产品下所有设备的语音控制

docs.title: 第五步：预发布产品并生成授权码
docs.text:
• 配置完产品相关内容后，产品处于 开发中 状态，无法生成授权码。
  • 单击 预发布 按钮，在弹出的对话框中单击 确定 按钮，使产品状态转为 预发布 状态。
  • 选择数据中心（目前只有印度数据中心），单击 生成授权码 按钮，在弹出的对话框中输入生成的数量以及备注，单击 确认 生成授权码。
  • 当系统处理完成后，您可以导出相应的授权码文件。

docs.title: 第六步：设备开发
docs.text:
• 将导出的授权码烧录在您的设备中，每台设备对应一组唯一授权码。

注意：一组授权码仅可烧录至一台设备，不可重复烧录。

  • 您可以通过 在线调试 选项卡对设备进行数据交互调试，查看设备实时日志，进行投产前的功能数据验证等操作。

docs.title: 第七步：产品发布
docs.text:
• 开发完成后即可对产品进行发布。
  • 单击 产品发布 按钮，在弹出的对话框中单击 确定 ，发布产品。

产品发布后不可再编辑。

docs.title: 固件管理
docs.text:
本文介绍如何新增、删除、修改、查询以及上传生产固件等操作。

  • 单击左侧导航栏 产品 > 固件管理 ，进入固件管理页面。

docs.title: 新建固件
docs.text:
此操作会生成一个 固件key ，固件key主要用于后续固件升级维护。

  • 单击 新固件 ，进入新建固件页面。

  • 在弹出的页面中填写固件信息，填写完成后单击 确认 进行保存。

  • 完成后在列表中可见生成的固件key。

docs.title: 上传生产固件
docs.text:
完成固件key的创建后，开发者需进行固件开发。开发完成后， 需要新建一个固件版本并上传有效的固件文件。

一般在产品开发中，主要上传生产固件和用户区固件。每上传一个固件文件（即新建固件版本），会维护为一个版本。

  • 单击高亮的 固件key 进入固件信息。

  • 在固件信息中单击 新固件版本 新建固件版本。

  • 在弹出页面中根据提示填写固件版本，上传固件包；完毕后单击 确定 保存修改。

为避免出错，请仔细阅读提示文本。

  • 固件版本创建完，默认为 未上架 状态，可以根据流程指导进行固件上架。

默认新建固件版本完成后，固件版本会有一个状态标识，分为两个状态：未上架和已上架。

  • 单击 发布 按钮进行固件上架，在弹出的对话框中单击 确认 进行发布。

  • 上架完成后固件版本状态会变为 已上架 。

docs.title: 查询固件
docs.text:
支持以 固件key 和 固件名称 搜索固件。

固件名称支持模糊查询，固件key支持精准查询。

此处以固件key为例进行查询。

  • 单击 固件名称 ，在下拉框中选择 固件key ，输入要查询的固件key，单击 搜索 进行查询。

  • 查询完成后，列表中会显示符合查询条件的固件信息。

docs.title: 编辑固件
docs.text:
• 单击 编辑 按钮，进入编辑固件页面。
  • 在编辑固件页面中编辑固件信息，修改完成后点击 确认 按钮保存。

只支持修改固件名称、flash大小、固件升级超时、备注说明。

docs.title: 删除固件
docs.text:
• 单击 删除 按钮，在对话框中点击 确认 ，完成固件删除。

注意：已关联固件版本的固件不可删除。

已关联固件提示：

  • 如您想要删除已关联的固件，您需要先将固件里的版本全部删除，再删除固件。

docs.title: 标准功能清单
docs.text:
标准功能是产品开发的前提。按类型分，标准功能可分为属性、事件和动作。本文将介绍如何新建、编辑、查询和导出标准功能。

属性：描述产品设备运行时的某种状态。

如：设备的在线状态。

事件：由产品设备运行过程中产生的信息、警告、和故障等。

事件是由设备上报的，一个事件包含多个输出参数。

如：设备在运行过程中发生故障，那么联网的设备可以将这些信息发送出去，通知人员及时处理。

动作：设备可以被调用的能力和方法。

动作由应用下发设备，设备可以返回结果给应用。

如：您希望灯能够烘托出浪漫的气氛，就要调节灯的颜色、亮度和色温。如果分别设置属性，将会非常繁琐，这时可以为灯增加一个场景模式的动作，一个命令就可以设置到浪漫模式。

docs.title: 新建标准功能
docs.text:
• 选择左侧导航栏 产品 > 标准功能清单 ，单击 创建功能 按钮。
  • 在弹出的页面中填写标准功能信息。

注意：功能类型选择不一样，填写的信息也不一样。

DP ID需要唯一。

  • 填写完毕后单击 确认 按钮进行保存。

这里以新建属性为例。

在新建功能完成后，功能列表中会显示您刚刚新建的功能。

docs.title: 编辑标准功能
docs.text:
• 单击您想要编辑的功能右侧的 编辑 按钮，进入编辑功能页面。
  • 在此处可以修改您想要修改的信息（DP ID无法修改），修改完成后单击 确认 按钮进行保存。

docs.title: 查询标准功能
docs.text:
查询功能支持多种查询方式：功能名称、DP ID、数据类型。

功能名称支持模糊查询，DP ID和数据类型支持精准查询。

此处以DP ID为查询条件。

  • 单击 功能名称 条件，在下拉框中选择 DP ID 条件。
  • 在输入框中输入您想要搜索的功能的DP ID。
  • 单击 搜索 按钮执行搜索。

  • 下方列表中会显示对应的功能。
  • 单击 重置 按钮会重置为未输入条件的状态。

同时，搜索功能支持多条件搜索。

此处以DP ID=10016， 数据类型=String为例。数据类型支持多选。

  • 单击 数据类型 选择框，在下拉框中选择想要的数据类型，选择完毕后单击 搜索 执行查询。

  • 下方列表中会显示对应的功能。

docs.title: 导出标准功能
docs.text:
您可以使用此功能导出所有标准功能。

  • 单击 导出 按钮。

  • 在弹出的对话框中单击 确认 执行导出。

  • 您可以在导出的Excel表里面查看标准功能详情。

docs.title: 编辑、删除、查询产品
docs.text: 本文介绍在创建开发中产品后可以对产品执行的操作。

docs.title: 编辑产品
docs.text:
产品处在 开发中 状态时，您可以对创建的产品进行编辑。

注意： 预发布 再撤回状态下的产品只能修改产品的名称，产品型号、产品类型以及联网方式不可修改。

已发布 产品不可编辑。

  • 在 产品 > 产品开发 页面中单击您要编辑的产品下方的 管理产品 按钮，在下拉框中单击 编辑 按钮，进入编辑页面。

  • 在编辑页面中您可以编辑修改产品名称、产品型号、产品类型、通讯协议等。修改完成后单击 确认 按钮进行保存。

docs.title: 删除产品
docs.text:
您可对不符合要求的产品进行删除处理。

注意：开发中 产品可删除，预发布 预发布存在生成过授权码和 已发布 的产品无法删除。

  • 在 产品 > 产品开发 页面中单击您要编辑的产品下方的 管理产品 按钮，在下拉框中单击 删除 按钮。

  • 在弹出的对话框中单击 确定 删除产品。

docs.title: 查询产品
docs.text:
在 产品 > 产品开发 页面可通过产品名称、产品PID、产品类型对产品进行搜索查询。其中产品名称支持模糊查询，产品PID和产品类型支持精准查询。

例如：

单击产品名称，在下拉框中单击PID，切换为PID搜索模式。

输入1802905533959634944，单击 查找 按钮，列表返回该PID产品数据。

docs.title: 设备管理
docs.text:
本文主要介绍对设备的管理操作，如查询设备、导出设备信息、解绑设备等功能。

  • 单击左侧导航栏 产品 > 设备管理， 进入到设备管理页面。

docs.title: 查询设备
docs.text:
支持多种查询方式查找设备。如产品型号、设备UUID、所属产品、首次激活时间、设备码。

  • 在上方的搜索栏里填写搜索条件，输入完毕后单击 搜索 按钮执行搜索。

  • 下方列表中显示符合条件的设备。

  • 可以在下拉框中切换搜索条件。

docs.title: 导出设备信息
docs.text:
在您查找到自己想要的设备信息之后，您可以选择导出设备信息到本地。

  • 在设备UUID左侧的选择框中选择您需要导出的设备信息，选择完成后单击上方的 导出 按钮进行导出。

  • 在弹出的对话框中单击 确认 执行导出。

  • 成功提交任务后，在弹出的对话框中单击 立即查看 按钮来查看任务的运行状态。

  • 在跳转的任务列表页面中可以看到提交的任务，单击任务右侧 下载 按钮下载导出的数据。

  • 您可以在导出的Excel表里面查看设备详情信息。

docs.title: 单台设备解绑
docs.text:
• 单击要解绑设备列表右侧的 设备解绑 。
  • 在弹出的对话框中单击 确认，解绑设备（解除设备和用户的绑定关系）。

docs.title: 批量设备解绑
docs.text:
• 单击 批量解绑 按钮。
  • 在弹出的页面中，您可以输入多个设备的UUID进行解绑，或选择上传csv文件的方式提交要解绑的设备UUID。

在上传csv文件时，您可以参照模板来修改您上传文件的格式。

  • 输入/上传完成后单击 确认 。

  • 成功提交任务后，在弹出的对话框中单击 立即查看 按钮来查看任务的运行状态。

  • 在跳转的任务列表页面中可以看到提交的任务。

  • 单击 任务编号 ，可以查看设备的解绑详情。

docs.title: DMP IoT Platform Device Access Guide
docs.text: This article mainly introduces the core process of device access to the DMP IoT platform and explains in detail the preparations that manufacturers must complete before connecting to the platform. If device developers need to connect IoT devices to the platform, please follow the steps described in the document one by one.

docs.title: Terminology Explanation
docs.text: • Please refer to Terminology Explanation.

docs.title: Preparations Required by Manufacturers Before Integration
Provide Product Information
docs.text:
• Provide the necessary information such as the product name, product category, product model, and communication protocol of the devices to be produced.
  • Jiuan will create the product in the management back-end based on the information provided by the manufacturer.

docs.title: Provide Product Model
docs.text:
• Manufacturers need to specify the standard functions of the device model. Please refer to the attached Product Model Standard Functions Template.xlsx.
  • Select the model functions included in the device in the attached Excel file and send it back to Jiuan.
  • If the model functions of your device are not listed in the attachment or the existing functions do not meet your needs, please contact Jiuan for additions.
  • Jiuan staff will import the product model into the management back-end.

docs.title: Apply for Device Authorization Code
docs.text: • Determine the number of devices to be produced, and Jiuan will provide the corresponding number of device authorization codes.

docs.title: Apply for Device SDK
docs.text:
• Manufacturers need to provide the SDK compilation chain to Jiuan. Examples of compilation chains are as follows:

Example 1: arm-anykav500-linux-uclibcgnueabi

Example 2: arm-anycloud-linux-uclibcgnueabi

  • Select the optional functions in the SDK. Optional functions include RTMP push, ONVIF, RTSP service, media services (including HLS, FLV, RTMP). Manufacturers should choose based on actual needs. If the manufacturer already has the above functions, they do not need to be selected again.
  • Jiuan will generate the corresponding device SDK based on the information provided by the manufacturer and provide it to the manufacturer.

docs.title: Step 1: Platform Creates Product
docs.text: This step is performed by Jiuan staff.

docs.title: Create Product
docs.text:
• The platform creates a device access type product in the system based on the information provided by the manufacturer.
  • After creating the product, the platform will generate a unique identifier (PID) for it.

docs.title: Step 2: Function Definition
docs.text: This step is performed by Jiuan staff.

docs.title: Define Model
docs.text: • Define the function points of the device under the product. A unified model helps standardize the data format between the device and the platform, simplifying device and application development.

docs.title: Associate Firmware
docs.text: • Define the firmware used by the device under the product.

docs.title: Step 3: Product Configuration
docs.text: This step is performed by Jiuan staff.

docs.title: Function Settings
docs.text: • Define the functions that users can control on the APP device settings panel.

docs.title: Product Display
docs.text: • Define the icon, product name, and product model displayed on the APP.

docs.title: Wizard Configuration
docs.text: • Define the device network configuration process on the APP.

docs.title: Step 4: Product Pre-release
docs.text: This step is performed by Jiuan staff.

docs.title: Product Pre-release
docs.text: • Pre-release refers to a pre-test and trial process before the official release of the product.

docs.title: Generate Authorization Code
docs.text: • The authorization code includes the product PID, device UUID, device key, QR code identifier, and device addressing domain.

docs.title: Step 5: Device Development
docs.text: This step needs to be completed by the manufacturer.

docs.title: Integrate Device SDK
docs.text: • Based on the function points defined by the manufacturer, the platform (Jiuan) provides the device SDK to the manufacturer. The manufacturer needs to complete the development work on the device side.

docs.title: Burn Authorization Code
docs.text: • The manufacturer needs to burn the device authorization code provided by the platform (Jiuan) into the device. Each device corresponds to a unique set of authorization codes. Please note that a set of authorization codes can only be burned into one device and cannot be reused.

docs.title: Device Debugging
docs.text: • Based on the defined model, perform data interaction debugging through the device debugging function, view real-time logs of the device, and conduct pre-production functional data verification.

docs.title: Step 6: Product Release
docs.text: This step is performed by Jiuan staff.

docs.title: Mass Production Release
docs.text: • For developed devices, mass production release can be carried out directly. In principle, the product cannot be modified after mass production release.

docs.title: Attachments
docs.text: Product Model Standard Functions Template.xlsx

docs.title: Terminology Explanation
docs.text: Term Description DMP The name of the IoT platform Product Model The digital abstract description of the device, detailing what the device is, what it can do, and what services it can provide. Attribute Describes the dynamic characteristics of the device, including its running state. Applications can initiate read and set requests for attributes. Event Upstream messages that can be triggered during device operation, such as operation records, alerts, and fault information. These can include multiple outputs. Service Describes the capabilities of the terminal device that can be called externally. Input and output parameters can be set. Services can implement complex logic. Authorization Code The credential for device access to the DMP IoT platform. Product PID "productId", a unique identifier assigned by the platform within the platform's scope. It is one of the components of the authorization code. Device UUID Universally Unique Identifier. The UUID is the unique identification ID of the device and is one of the components of the authorization code. Device Key The key for the device to connect to the DMP IoT platform, which is one of the components of the authorization code. QR Code Identifier A QR code printed on the device to help users quickly add the device, which is one of the components of the authorization code. Device Addressing Domain The domain name for the device to obtain connection server information, which is one of the components of the authorization code. Device SDK A set of software tools including libraries, sample code, and documentation designed to help developers more easily build, integrate, and use specific devices.

docs.title: 厂商接入指导
docs.text: 本文主要介绍设备接入 DMP 物联网平台的核心流程，并详细说明厂商在接入平台前必须完成的准备工作。设备开发商如需将物联网设备接入平台，请按照文档中说明，逐一完成相关步骤操作。

docs.title: 名词解析
docs.text: • 请参照 名词解析
